name: Koshmar (maksymdev)
description:
Koshmar is fantasy like brawler game where you play as a little boy that has to face his mirror-like enemies.

It is a brawler game without direct contact, you punch or kick by typing key sequences for each enemy. Those are magical punches and kick and deal spiritual damage to enemies.

How to play?

To deal damage follow the keys sequence on screen. If you finish sequence you kill enemy.

If you missclick you'll get damage. If the timer goes down you get damage.

Objective: Find and eliminate Koshmar.

Have fun,

Maksym

Can't play? Watch my walkthrough: 

Credits to: Gravity Sound for music in background
